TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ItemChangedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks An <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ItemChanged> event occurs whenever the item in a list is changed. For example, this event will occur when the text of the list item is changed to a new value. This event is not raised when the item is moved to a new position within the list because of a new item being added.
For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).
## Examples The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ItemChanged> event. This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> named `CurrencyManager1`. Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ItemChanged> event.
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#191](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#191)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#191](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#191)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Index As Integer
public: property int Index { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Indicates the position of the item being changed within the list.
Docs.value: The zero-based index to the item being changed.
